href.Description: The Image content type can be used to upload an image in various formats (JPG, GIF, PNG, SVG). The uploaded image should always have a high resolution so that it can be used flexibly, for example as a banner image. Plone automatically delivers the images in the best scaling, so there is no need to scale images down manually.

9128296e-d159-4b24-9e98-f6d2c8b408d6.plaintext: The Teaser Block in Plone can be used to link to an existing content object from an overview or landing page. The Teaser block will automatically fetch the content from the connected object (Title, Description, Kicker, Preview Image), making the lives of editors as easy as possible. This page demonstrates all possible variations and configurations of the Teaser block in Plone.

children.text: The Teaser Block in Plone can be used to link to an existing content object from an overview or landing page. The Teaser block will automatically fetch the content from the connected object (Title, Description, Kicker, Preview Image), making the lives of editors as easy as possible. This page demonstrates all possible variations and configurations of the Teaser block in Plone.
